title: MAJESTIC CANYON VIEWS | STAINLESS APPLIANCE | MILES OF JOG\WALK TRAILS
posting_body: Exclusive community offering unprecedented level of style and sophistication featuring three bedroom townhome floorplan that fits your needs.
Indulge in premium amenities - clubhouse pool featuring BBQ grills, wet bar, TV's, game room, theater room, billiards coffee bar, 24/7 fitness gym, hike/bike trails, garages available and more!
Excellent location - close proximity to major employers like Apple, Oracle, Flextronics, Dell ect...near some of  Atlanta's best shopping, restaurants, entertainment ect...
GA's Agent - Contact me today to schedule a personal tour!
Not finding what your looking for browsing online?
Let me do the work, over 20 years experience working and living in Atlanta GA, I will save you time and money!
Call, Text or E-mail me today!
I have access to anything online and much more, guaranteed to make your next move effortless!
